Description: As webshop-owner, I want my customers to be able to create an account on the webshop.
As webshop-owner, I want my customers to be able to login to their account and see their previous orders.
As webshop-owner, I want my customers to be able to add, and remove items to/from their shopping cart.
As webshop-owner, I want my customers to be able to order items from the webshop
As webshop-owner, I want my customers to be able to filter on all the items in the webshop.
As webshop-owner, I want my customers to be able to leave a review on an item they previously bought.
As webshop-owner, I want my customers to be able to pay for their orders in the common ways (Ideal, CC, Accept-giro).
As webshop-owner, I want my customers to be able to share their order / review on Social Media.
As webshop-owner, I want my customers to be able to navigate through the webshop in a normal way.
As webshop-owner, I want to be able to add additional products in my webshop, including pictures.
As webshop-owner, I want to be able to track sales and customers.
As webshop-owner, I want to be able to add, and remove filtering options to the webshop.
As webshop-owner, I want to be able to add coupons for discounts or special actions to the webshop.
As webshop-owner, I want to be able to use personalised templates / themes for the webshop.
As webshop-owner, I want to be able to configure the menu of the webshop with new products, or remove items from the menu
As webshop-owner, I want to be able to edit my product details in the webshop.
As webshop-owner, I want to be able to add details to products in the webshop.
As webshop-owner, I want to be able to show my customers reviews with the product in the webshop.
As webshop-owner, I want to be able to change the home screen of the webshop.
As webshop-owner, I want to be able to sell my products in Western-Europe.
